title: BONUS: BobbyCast #332 - Morgan Wade on Writing Songs In Secret Her Entire Life and Never Writing Down Her Lyrics  +  The Success of “Wilder Days” and Her Debut Album + Working as A Tax Examiner and Finding Her First Band On Craigslist
itunes:title: BONUS: BobbyCast #332 - Morgan Wade on Writing Songs In Secret Her Entire Life and Never Writing Down Her Lyrics  +  The Success of “Wilder Days” and Her Debut Album + Working as A Tax Examiner and Finding Her First Band On Craigslist
description:
In this episode of The BobbyCast: Bobby sits down with one of his favorite new artists, Morgan Wade. She made waves with her debut album “Reckless” and had a huge year in 2021. Morgan talks about how she didn’t start performing in front of people until she was 19, finding her first bandmates on Craigslist and performing her own songs right out of the gate. Morgan talks about the success of her first project and how it led to major label interest and how her song “Wilder Days” changed from when he first wrote it to when it was released. 

Follow the podcast: @TheBobbyCast

Watch this Episode on Youtube

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
